DOC.brief_summary: Question : Does manual diaphragm release change kinematics respiratory function elderly subject ? Design : Randomized control trial conceal allocation double-blinding . Participants : 17 volunteer 60 year old randomize two group : 09 Control Group ( CG ) 08 Intervention Group ( IG ) . Intervention : The manual diaphragm release technique use IG , two set ten deep breath , one minute interval . The CG underwent sham protocol ( light touch ) , sets time interval . Outcome measure : The group evaluate use spirometry , manovacuometry optoelectronic plethysmography ( OEP ) , order , immediately intervention .
DOC.brief_title: MANUAL DIAPHRAGM RELEASE TECHNIQUE INCREASES TIDAL VOLUME IN ELDERLY
DOC.criteria: 60 year age ; body mass index ( BMI ) 30 kg/m2 nonsmoker , selfdeclared sedentary ; present forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) force vital capacity ( FVC ) great equal 80 % predict ; ratio variable ( FEV1/FVC ) great 70 % spirometry Showed inability understand verbal command evaluation .
